ai-patthana10.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.4:0.3_0: I saw a skilled cooking between your eyes
ai-patthana10.4:1.1_0: It’s not due to the teaching of the skillful, nor is conditioned by conditions.
ai-patthana10.4:9.1_0: or reckoned as an unwholesome quality.
ai-patthana10.4:11.1_0: nor do I seek a dead corpse.
ai-patthana10.4:15.1_0: Not with the skilled in the supermundane state,
ai-patthana10.4:17.1_0: not for a skilled in means.
ai-patthana10.4:17.1_1: not for one who isn’t skilled in questions,
ai-patthana10.4:17.1_2: This is the section in brief.
